biotools.summary: This package creates a predictive model of regulatory sequences used to score unknown sequences based on the content of DNA motifs, NGS peaks and signals and other numerical scores of the sequences using supervised classification. It contains a workflow based on the support vector machine (SVM) algorithm that maps features to sequences.

bioschemas.name: LedPred
bioschemas.summary: This package creates a predictive model of regulatory sequences used to score unknown sequences based on the content of DNA motifs, NGS peaks and signals and other numerical scores of the sequences using supervised classification.
